incoming.page_description.en: Share sensitive information securely with our support team
incoming.page_description.translation: Varno delite občutljive informacije z našo ekipo za podporo

incoming.feature_disabled_description.en: This feature is currently disabled. Please contact support for assistance.
incoming.feature_disabled_description.translation: Ta funkcija je trenutno onemogočena. Za pomoč se obrnite na podporo.

incoming.memo_placeholder.translation: Kratek opis (npr. Zahteva za ponastavitev gesla)

incoming.memo_hint.en: Help us route your message to the right person
incoming.memo_hint.translation: Pomagajte nam usmeriti vaše sporočilo pravi osebi

incoming.recipient_aria_label.en: Select a recipient for this secret

incoming.recipient_hint.en: Choose who will receive this secure message
incoming.recipient_hint.translation: Izberite, kdo bo prejel to varno sporočilo

incoming.secret_content_placeholder.en: Paste sensitive information here (passwords, keys, etc.)
incoming.secret_content_placeholder.translation: Prilepite občutljive informacije sem (gesla, ključe itd.)

incoming.secret_content_hint.en: This information will be encrypted and only viewable once
incoming.secret_content_hint.translation: Te informacije bodo šifrirane in vidne samo enkrat

incoming.success_description.en: Your secure message has been delivered.
incoming.success_description.translation: Vaše varno sporočilo je bilo dostavljeno.

incoming.success_info_description.en: The recipient will be able to view this secret only once. After they view it, the secret will be permanently deleted.
incoming.success_info_description.translation: Prejemnik bo lahko videl to skrivnost samo enkrat. Po ogledu bo skrivnost trajno izbrisana.

incoming.tagline2.en: Keep passwords and private data out of email and chat logs
incoming.tagline2.translation: Hranite gesla in zasebne podatke stran od e-pošte in dnevnikov klepeta
